name: Vena Medical
headline: Vena Medical is providing physicians with the world's smallest cameraâ¦
description: Pre-clinical results published in the Journal of Neuro-Interventional Surgery. Technology presented at the World Live Neurovascular Conference. Technology selected as a top 3 finalist for Innovator of the Year by the Congress of Neurological Surgeons. Raised a Series A to fund commercialization (FDA Clearance, Health Canada, ISO 13485, First-in-man and early revenue).

founders.name: Michael Phillips, Founder
founders.description: Graduated from University of Waterloo with a Bachelor of Applied Science (B.A.Sc.) focused in Mechanical Engineering with an Entrepreneurship Option. Michael co-founded Vena Medical during the final year of his undergraduate degree and went full-time immediately after graduating. Attended TMCx Accelerator and Y Combinator in the year following. Published author in the Journal of Neuro-Interventional Surgery and the American Journal of Neuroradiology, and inventor on 5 granted patents.

#AccesstheFuture
# Vena MicroAngioscope™
Vena Medical is providing physicians with the world's smallest camera capable of going inside veins and arteries to help them treat stroke.
## A whole new perspective.
![The distal tip of the Vena Balloon Distal Access Catheter used for mechanical thrombectomies to treat stoke.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/c2796a_863a734aba0c4ec6ac84b35b8e8e23bf~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_540,h_499,al_r,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/c2796a_863a734aba0c4ec6ac84b35b8e8e23bf~mv2.jpg)
## The superior solution to distal navigation.
# [ Vena BDAC™ ](https://www.venamed.ca/<https:/www.venamed.ca/vena-bdac>)
The Vena BDAC™ combines the Balloon Guide Catheters and Distal Access Catheters that are currently used in thrombectomy to remove clots from the brains of stroke victims. Combining these two devices allows the clinician to get the balloon much closer to the clot, which is shown to improve key metrics like First Pass Success Rate, allowing removal of the clot on the first try and leading to significantly better patient outcomes. 
[Learn More](https://www.venamed.ca/<https:/www.venamed.ca/vena-bdac>)
## Check out our live demo at SLICE 2024
Hear about our story, a clinical case series and a live demo of the technology.
[Live Demo Here](https://www.venamed.ca/<https:/vimeo.com/1034226061/7a99a63c8d>)
![Vena Medical](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/c2796a_1d17694ce6fa4ae9ab51c6942785cf34~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_720,enc_auto/file.jpeg 1x, https://static.wixstatic.com/media/c2796a_1d17694ce6fa4ae9ab51c6942785cf34~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_2560,h_1440,enc_auto/file.jpeg 2x, https://static.wixstatic.com/media/c2796a_1d17694ce6fa4ae9ab51c6942785cf34~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_3840,h_2160,enc_auto/file.jpeg 3x)

generated_description:
**Vena Medical: Innovating Stroke Treatment with Cutting-Edge Technology**

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2016 and based in Kitchener, Canada, Vena Medical is on a mission to revolutionize how physicians treat stroke by providing them with the world's smallest camera, designed to navigate inside veins and arteries. Their technology aims to enhance the accuracy and effectiveness of stroke interventions, offering a clearer view of the problem areas in the body.

**Background:**  
Vena Medical began with promising pre-clinical results that were showcased in the *Journal of Neuro-Interventional Surgery* and at the World Live Neurovascular Conference. Their innovative approach has earned them accolades, including recognition as one of the top three finalists for Innovator of the Year by the Congress of Neurological Surgeons. The company has successfully raised a Series A funding round aimed at achieving commercialization milestones such as FDA clearance and ISO 13485 certification.

**Team and Structure:**  
With a lean team of 7 employees and part of the Y Combinator Batch W18, Vena Medical is guided by a spirit of innovation and efficiency. Their Group Partner is noted as Nan, contributing to their strategic direction.

**Product Focus:**  
The flagship product, the **Vena MicroAngioscope™,** equips physicians with unmatched visualization capabilities during critical procedures. This small camera enhances their ability to diagnose and treat strokes effectively, potentially improving patient outcomes significantly. Another key offering is the **Vena BDAC™** (Balloon Distal Access Catheter), which integrates existing thrombectomy devices to enhance the success rate of clot removal during strokes.

**Recent Activities and Engagements:**  
Vena Medical is actively preparing for the SLICE 2024 event, where they will present live demonstrations and share their clinical experiences. They are committed to fostering dialogue within the medical community about their advancements and the implications for stroke treatment.

**Tagline:**  
Vena Medical isn’t just innovating; they’re redefining what's possible in medical technology focused on stroke recovery.

**Find Out More:**  
You can explore their offerings, team, and latest updates on their website: [Vena Medical](https://www.venamed.ca/). This is a company to watch as they navigate the complexities of medical devices and make significant contributions to healthcare.
